title: Onyeeze
author: Onyeeze
content: People don't have statistics to play gamble and that is why some of the gambling enthusiasm do experience (shege in gambling... meaning much loses in a gambling) so it's good for gamblers to know a specific amount that should go out in their wallet weekly or monthly.When you check the statistics of who is on constant gambling of different kind of gambling either casino, poker game and other gambling games, should check the funds that goes out of them monthly because of gambling and they funds they received in a month and annually in gambling if they are of the same amount.If we planned our gambling bet we should not be going crazy after when we have not meet up our target in gambling, what i expected every gambler is to make table of how much should be spend in gambling and how much should go investment, because money we loses in gambling continuously if we gather it together it will sum up to start a little business. I'm say play gamble with experience, don't use all you have for casino gambling

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Although only few people got involved in thispoll, but with more people that comment, most of us on this forum are gambling responsibly.Weekly gambling budget is good. I think it should not be more than 5% of your weekly income. If you gamble with just 5% out of 100%, I think that is a responsible gambling.To avoid gambling addiction, it starts from using little budget.

Doesn't matter if you have "statistics" or not (not even sure what that means...), but you should only gamble if you can afford to gamble. If you can't afford or if you need the money for something else, you shouldn't gamble at all. Not even a % of your money that you earn. comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: Bankroll management is the proper term for this. Gamble responsibly because that income is also going to feed your family, their expenses and education.  If this is not working out, limit the budget on things that need spending and include your monthly gambling expenditure on it. Problem is that most addicted gamblers cannot make themselves so this or follow it. So they need someone to help them out. Family and friends can take this responsibility if they are supportive enough. Who knows maybe doing this budget for the first time may motivate that gambler to reduce gambling spending and eventually stop this addiction.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: That's pretty much the standard. You should definitely do that if you are going to consider the gambling route that you want. Budgeting isn't a bad thing and having a specified amount can lead you to the betterment of yourself to limiting your losses and not regretting it in the long run. The enemy is yourself, thinking that "only if..." that would make you want to think that you should've done something in the past and that's the convincing factor in the present that you are going to gamble because "What the heck".It's all about self control and being satisfied that you have experienced it and be positive about any outcome. As long as you have set the amount, it would be best if you were placed.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Being a responsible gambler is not a bad thing, and its necessary.Imagine being too careless using your own hard earned money, that can be a big loss and frustrating.We have to be more careful and consider every option to avoid big losses, if you can't gamble that much then don't do it. Don't be greedy, I know we all want to make money but in gambling, the more you rush it the more you lose the money. Just enjoy the process and enjoy the game, if you're lucky enough profit will come.

comments.author: tusandii
comments.body: What needs to be done is to have a limit on the amount of money that is willing to lose to be at stake, so that a gambler will not lose large amounts of money or not feel a deep defeat.But indeed there are still many gamblers who are not careful and have control over themselves when they are in the gambling industry.Ok, we gamble for fun and if we are lucky we can get a profit, but if there are no limits at all times when we gamble, in the end it is not pleasure that is obtained but disappointment over the losses experienced.

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: Onyeeze on July 27, 2023, 04:41:50 AMWhen you check the statistics of who is on constant gambling of different kind of gambling either casino, poker game and other gambling games, should check the funds that goes out of them monthly because of gambling and they funds they received in a month and annually in gambling if they are of the same amount.The stats are not public and we cannot check any gambler's fund in and out of gambling sites to analyze how much anyone is investing ins gambling and how much ration is he making profit out of it.Yes, one can make certain rules and limitations as to how much he or she will gamble weekly or monthly and allocate a predefined budget for it. Under any circumstances, this budget should not be exceeded and this way, the gambler will remain within certain limits and even if he loses his entire balance, still he knows that he has spent nothing extra.

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: You actually do not need statistics on your gambling wins and losses to control it. There are two things you need.... namely :1. The amounts that you deposited 2. The current balance. The statistics on your wins and losses will just be confusing for many people... so they will most likely never even look at it. You know what your Monthly budget for gambling are.... just prevent from going over that amount and you will be fine.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Quote from: Onyeeze on July 27, 2023, 04:41:50 AM~We don't really need to check the stats of people who gamble, that's just dumb. Just set a specific amount you CAN spend (and will) spend for each session, each amount should adjust depending on the number of times you gamble say per week or per month. And no, gathering the same amount of money isn't exactly possible since it's money you decided to dedicate for your enjoyment/entertainment. There's a different part of your income that should go directly to money that will be used for investing. Those kinds of financing would make your life a whole lot easier and at the same time stress free (just don't forget to add enjoyment, spend a little for yourself).
